name: Lysandra Frostbane
appearance: A gaunt, hooded figure clad in tattered black robes adorned with frost runes. Her icy blue eyes seem to pierce through the very soul of those she encounters.

stunts.name: Bitter Frost
stunts.description: Whenever you use Ice magic, your target suffers additional -1 stress and -2 consequence points.

stunts.name: Shadows of the Past
stunts.description: You can always find a hiding spot or escape unnoticed in any location. Resolve this stunt at the start of the scene to get out of sticky situations.

stunts.name: Mysterious Patron
stunts.description: Once per session, you can call upon a secret benefactor who provides you with supplies or information without revealing their identity.

quirks: Prefers to work alone at night
fears: Being betrayed by those closest to her
Losing the power she holds over ice and snow
desires: To uncover the truth behind her lineage
To protect the innocent from the corrupt forces of magic

backstory.origin: Born into a line of powerful mages, Lysandra's childhood was filled with whispers of dark secrets and forbidden knowledge.
backstory.formativeEvent: After an encounter with a vengeful spirit that sought to possess her during one of her magical rituals, she vanished from her home village, never to return.
backstory.secret: Lysandra carries within her the fragmented essence of a long-lost artifact known as the Heartstone, which grants immense power but comes at a terrible cost.
backstory.summary: Haunted by her past and driven by an insatiable thirst for knowledge, Lysandra roams the Shattered Realms, seeking to unravel the mysteries surrounding her heritage and the corruption that threatens the very fabric of reality.

voice.quirks: Speaks in a detached, almost clinical manner; often uses formal language even when conversing with common folk.
